label: A_hP4_194_ac-001
title: $\alpha$-La ($A3'$) Structure
comments: This crystal is close-packed, with stacking ABACABAC$\dots$, as opposed to ABAB$\dots$ for the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hP2_194_c-001}{hcp ($A3$) structure} and ABCABC$\dots$ for the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF4_225_a-001}{fcc ($A1$) lattice}. The (2a) crystallographic sites (the A layer) form a simple hexagonal lattice. The (2c) sites (the B and C layers) form an hcp structure.
